author: AngelCalvo
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

Providing links on how to build PowerShell....

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: These changes don't make sense to me - the internals of building only matter if you can build, and that means you've already installed PowerShell, and can likely build successfully as well.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
These changes don't make sense in this document - it's assumed you already have installed and built PowerShell using one of the other documents, and want a better understanding of what's going on.

I don't think it's necessary to link to the build instructions in this document, anyone jumping straight to an "internals" document can figure it out without a link.

title: Update internals.md
